name: (Paper 4) Cambridge Key English Test (KET4) - Writing Course
intro: (Level A2) Improve your writing skills with this structured KET4 course. Practice responding to real-world scenarios with clear and concise writing. This course is designed to help you develop effective communication skills for the Writing section of the KET exam.
lessonNames: Write Spencer a note. Answer the questions with 25 to 35 words.
